ctu.nengoros.tools.io

Class AgentSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.tools.io.AgentSaver

  • public class AgentSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    Is able to save and load agent configurations made by EA e.g., holds fitness, generation and genome. Note that number of generations stored should be unique. NoteII: this works only for files in the current directory from Jython!!! (so do not use sub-directories)
